statements: UPDATE IOCs SET detected_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE ioc_id = 1;
UPDATE IOCs SET ioc_type = 'Domain', ioc_value = 'example.com' WHERE ioc_id = 2;
UPDATE IOCs SET ioc_type='Domain', detected_date='2023-10-15' WHERE ioc_id=1
UPDATE IOCs SET ioc_type='IP', ioc_value='192.168.1.1', detected_date='2023-10-20' WHERE ioc_id=2
UPDATE IOCs SET indicator = 'Malicious IP', details = 'IP address 192.168.1.1 has been identified as malicious' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Threats SET severity = 'High', description = 'This threat poses a serious risk to the system' WHERE ioc_id = '234e5678-9abc-4def-9012-345678123456';
UPDATE IOCs SET details = 'New details', created_at = now() WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Threats SET severity = 'High', description = 'Updated description' WHERE ioc_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE IOCs SET description='New Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Threats SET status='Resolved', severity=3 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE IOCs SET description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Threats SET severity = 5, status = 'Active' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE indicators_of_compromise SET severity = 5 WHERE ioc_type = 'Malware';
UPDATE threats SET threat_level = 'High' WHERE threat_name = 'Ransomware Attack';
UPDATE indicators_of_compromise SET severity = 8 WHERE id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE threats SET threat_level = 'High', detection_date = '2022-09-15 14:30:00' WHERE threat_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE indicators_of_compromise SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE indicators_of_compromise SET description = 'New description', type = 'Malware' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE threat_actors SET country = 'Russia', description = 'Advanced persistent threat group' WHERE id = 3;
